detail_desc: Round-necked T-shirt in soft jersey.
Knee-length shorts in washed cotton twill with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, diagonal side pockets and a fake welt back pocket.
Fitted tube top in soft cotton jersey.
Pyjama bottoms in lightweight fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and tapered legs with ribbed hems.
Cropped top in jersey crêpe with a deep V-neck, drawstring down the front for a draped effect and short, wide sleeves.
Straight-cut dress in a soft weave with a V-neck and small stand-up collar. Dropped shoulders, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined.
Dress in soft, organic cotton jersey with flutter sleeves and an elasticated seam at the waist with decorative gathers.
Trousers in washed stretch twill with a regular, elasticated waist and slim legs.
Lace push-up bra with underwired, moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a narrow fastening at the back with two pairs of hooks and eyes.
Sleeveless top in an airy weave. Opening with a button at the back of the neck and a double frill around the armholes. Lined.
Jumper in a soft knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Knee-length trenchcoat in a woven modal blend with notch lapels and 3/4-length sleeves with a tab and decorative button at the cuffs. Front pockets, a detachable tie belt at the waist, and slits in the sides. Unlined.
T-shirt in printed cotton jersey.
Knee-length, A-line dress in jersey with a gathered seam and flounce at the hem for added volume. Unlined.
Long, 5-pocket shorts in washed stretch denim with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and button, and raw-edge hems.
Knee-length satin skirt with a high, elasticated waist and pockets in the side seams. Unlined.

Dress in lightweight sweatshirt fabric and a pair of leggings in jersey. Dress with long raglan sleeves, press-studs at the back of one shoulder, and a gently rounded hem with short slits in the sides. Leggings with an elasticated waist and all-over print.
Short-sleeved top in slub linen jersey with a round neck and rounded hem.
Wide jumper in a soft, rib knit containing some wool with a V-neck at the front and long sleeves.

Shorter top in sturdy, textured jersey with a round neckline and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Long, wide sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs, and a seam at the hem with a wide panel.
Jacquard-patterned socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Short, fitted dress in ribbed jersey with a round neckline and short sleeves. Drawstring at the sides to create a draped effect.
Running vest top in fast-drying functional fabric with mesh sections and a racer back. Slightly longer with a rounded hem at the back.

Corset top in imitation leather with a slightly worn finish, a zip down the front, one fake zipped pocket at the front and one fake pocket with a press-stud. Inset section in stretch jersey at the back.

Shoes in imitation leather with a rubber trim, decorative welt seam around the soles and lacing at the front. Supplied with an extra pair of striped shoelaces. Canvas linings and insoles and chunky rubber soles. Heel 2.5 cm.
Slides in imitation leather with a wide foot strap and imitation leather linings and insoles. Heel approx. 1 cm.
V-neck strappy top in ribbed jersey with buttons down the front.
Top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a wrapover hood, print motif on the front and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with lined cups with removable inserts, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a racer back with a ventilating mesh detail. Wide elastication at the hem. Medium support.
V-neck T-shirt in soft cotton jersey.
Pyjama top and shorts in soft jersey. Wide-fitting, short-sleeved top with a print motif on the front. Patterned shorts with covered elastication at the waist.
Top in printed sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Wide, straight-cut shirt in a cotton weave with a collar and buttons down the front. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and slits in the sides.
Cap with an appliqué on the front and concealed elastication at the back.
Treggings in stretch, denim-look jersey with an elasticated waist, fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Oversized top in sweatshirt fabric with terry inside. Short sleeves with grosgrain trims, and slits in the sides.
Suit waistcoat in woven fabric with buttons at the front, a chest pocket and jetted front pockets. Back in a glossy weave with an adjustable tab. Lined.
Joggers in soft sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and elasticated hems. Soft brushed inside.
Slim-fit jeans in washed superstretch denim with hard-worn details, an adjustable elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y) and zip fly and press-stud. Fake front pockets, real back pockets and narrow hems.
Sleeveless blouse in woven fabric. Buttons down the front, chest pocket, yoke with gathers at the back and tie at the hem. Rounded at the back.
Short, wide dress in woven fabric with a V-neck, buttons down the front, long sleeves and narrow, buttoned cuffs. Gathered seam at the waist and hem. Unlined.
Ankle-length trousers in imitation leather with a high waist, zip fly, side pockets and straight-cut legs that taper gently to the hems.
Fitted, off-the-shoulder jumper in a ribbed viscose blend with a foldover top and long sleeves.
Padded jacket in a slightly longer style with a stand-up collar and faux fur-trimmed hood. Zip down the front, a concealed drawstring at the waist, and zipped side pockets. Lined.
Jumper knitted in a soft wool blend with decorations. Low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Coat in an Italian wool blend containing some soft cashmere with buttons down the front and a high stand-up collar with concealed press-studs. Side pockets, two inner pockets, decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined.
Calf-length skirt in a patterned viscose weave with elastication at the back of the waist and an asymmetric hem. Unlined.
Top in soft cotton jersey with long sleeves, a chest pocket and short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.

Trousers in airy wool twill with elastication and a concealed drawstring at the waist and a zip fly with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener. Side pockets, welt back pockets with a button, a slightly lower crotch and tapered legs with creases.
Calf-length satin kaftan dress with a V-neck, short sleeves and slits in the sides. Seam and a double drawstring at the waist with satin ribbons that tie at the sides. Unlined.
Sleeveless satin top with gathers on the shoulders, a V-neck and concealed hook-and-eye fastening. Narrow elasticated seam at the waist with a drawstring.
Short-sleeved top in cotton jersey with a print motif, double-layered, wrapover hood and short slits at the sides. Slightly longer at the back.

Joggers in cotton poplin with an elasticated, drawstring waist, diagonal side pockets, flap leg pockets with concealed press-studs and welt back pockets. Slim Fit – a fit that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a fitted silhouette.
Set with metal earrings and ear cuffs in various designs. Five pairs of earrings that can be worn separately or together. Two ear cuffs.
Padded jacket with a high stand-up collar, zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front, pockets in the side seams and a concealed drawstring at the hem.
Trousers in soft viscose jersey with a regular, elasticated waist, low crotch, side pockets and tapered legs.
Set with a long-sleeved top and pair of leggings in soft cotton jersey. Top with a small opening and button at the back of the neck and a flounce at the top. Leggings with an elasticated waist.
Short-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a straight-cut hem with rows of fringing and long slits in the sides.
Lounge trousers in satin with print stripes, an elasticated drawstring waist and straight, wide legs.
Cycling shorts in soft cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Fine-knit socks with soft terry inside and anti-slip protectors on the soles.

Short blouse in an airy, patterned viscose weave with a sweetheart neckline and decorative, covered buttons down the front. Long puff sleeves with elastication at the shoulders and cuffs, and a wide smocked panel at the back.
Lace push-up bra with underwired, moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.

High-waisted, ankle-length trousers in a viscose weave with contrasting colour seams, a visible button fly, side pockets and a welt back pocket. Slim legs that flare from a seam at the knees and have slits at the hems.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood with a wrapover front. Long sleeves, a kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Hat in a soft knit with a pompom on top and a ribbed hem.
Fitted polo-neck top in soft modal jersey with long sleeves.
Wide V-neck blouse in a viscose weave with short sleeves and buttons down the front.

Set with a dungaree dress and top in soft cotton. Dress in slightly stretchy narrow-wale corduroy with elastication at the sides and adjustable straps with metal fasteners. Unlined. Long-sleeved top in jersey.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low, V-shaped waist and high cut at the back.
Short, fitted dress in ribbed jersey with a square neckline at the front, a deep neckline at the back and short sleeves.
Water bottle in patterned plastic with a glittery snap-on lid and spout and a practical carry strap. Capacity 450 ml.
Fitted, long-sleeved jumper in a rib knit with a small stand-up collar.
Two pairs of longjohns in soft cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
Cotton canvas trainers with elasticated lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Fabric linings and insoles and fluted rubber soles.
T-shirt in soft slub jersey made from a modal and cotton blend. Short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups and a rounded hem.

Handbag accessory with a metal chain and carabiner hook and imitation leather pendant in the shape of a backpack. The backpack has a zip at the top, faux fur pompom and small, zipped outer compartment. Size approx. 3x7x9 cm.
Straight-cut top in airy jersey crêpe with a boat neck and short sleeves with pleated trims.
Jumper in a soft rib knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and a sewn-in wrapover at the front with a decorative bow at one side.
Trousers in airy crinkled chiffon with an elasticated waist and straight, wide legs with slits at the front that go up to the waist. Lined with short jersey shorts.
